tech_news.title: LG Update Installs Unremovable Microsoft Copilot on Smart TVs, Ignites Backlash - WebProNews
tech_news.description: LG's recent software update has forcibly installed Microsoft Copilot, an AI assistant, on smart TVs without removal options, sparking widespread user backlash over privacy, bloatware, and loss of control. This highlights growing tensions in smart devices, whe…

tech_news.title: Fake Windows update pushes malware in new ClickFix attack - Fox News
tech_news.description: The ClickFix campaign disguises malware as legitimate Windows updates, using steganography to hide shellcode in PNG files and bypass security detection systems.
